description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This game pits you agains stunning cityscapes. Can you navigate the beams to hit the target? 49 levels give you hours and hours of riveting play time.  Winning the game is easy. Just aim and fire. But the simplicity is deceiving as every level has to be mastered in its own way. Have fun!
